attributes.action: Change the price of PS4 Digital games.
attributes.background: In many countries and in america, the games are $60 (£39.18). Even on the US psn store, After american tax, its still much cheaper. Make PS4 Digital games £40 now, like most UK shops, instead of £54.99!

rejection.details: The Government and Parliament don't control the prices that retailers choose to set for their products.
